Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a doctored image.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the image has been manipulated.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the image is genuine and portrays the true beliefs of the person in the photo.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that the person in the photo was actually holding a sign that reads "#Justice4All" and not an anti-monarchy sign.
Understate: The claim may understate the significance of the doctored image and its potential impact on public opinion.
Exaggerate: There is no clear evidence of exaggeration in the claim.
Falters at times: The claim does not appear to falter at any point.
